/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a tree-lined street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up at the towering trees and the clear blue sky. The sun is shining brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the scene. A black car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of modern life to the otherwise tranquil setting. On the left side of the street, a person is seen walking, perhaps enjoying a leisurely stroll under the shade of the trees. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall scene is a harmonious blend of nature and urban life.
